name: Dark Horse Defender
description:
You have awoken from the battle of the night before to find the enemy is still advancing. Even though your equipment is damaged you'll need to fight and survive to save yourself and the others that need protecting. Go forth soldier and save the day!

This was a project made for MigJam #5 in 9 days hope you like it and I look forward to your feedback.

Resources:

-Unity: https://unity.com/

-Aseprite: https://www.aseprite.org/
